name: Terra-1530
goal:
The non-governmental organization “Terra-1530” has been registered on June 30, 1999.

We have the mission to instruct and strengthen rural communities’ capacity on Sustainable Development.

The NGO Terra-1530 is an umbrella-organization for other 18 ones: Terra-HS; Association for Youth Promotion 21 Century etc.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Sport
euInitiatives: Starting with 2000, we have been continually publishing the independent periodical ADEVARUL (Truth), newly in three languages: Romanian, Russian and English.
